[60 Degrees Pharma Provides University of Kentucky with Right of Reference to ARAKODA® NDA in Support of SJ733 Phase IIb Study](/news-releases/news-release-details/60-degrees-pharma-provides-university-kentucky-right-reference)

University of Kentucky will commence a Phase IIb clinical study of drug development candidate SJ733 for treatment of vivax malaria. SJ733 will be combined with a single dose of tafenoquine in the study. The right of reference allows FDA to review 60 Degrees Pharma’s regulatory file when the agency
